properties.address: Prestige Lakeside Habitat, Varthur Main Road
properties.description: Luxurious 3 BHK flat in premium gated community. Features include modular kitchen, vitrified tiles, and premium fittings. The complex offers world-class amenities including swimming pool, gym, clubhouse, and children's play area. Excellent connectivity to tech parks and Whitefield main road.

Spacious 2 BHK flat with excellent natural lighting and ventilation. Located in prime HSR Layout with easy access to cafes, restaurants, and shopping centers. Close to metro station and major tech companies. Ready to move in.

Premium 4 BHK flat with modern architecture and stunning views. This luxurious property features Italian marble flooring, designer kitchen with branded appliances, and spacious balconies. The township offers retail outlets, international school, and hospital within the complex. Perfect for families working in nearby IT corridors.

Well-maintained 2 BHK flat in established community. Great location with proximity to Marathahalli bridge, tech parks, and shopping malls. The flat comes with covered parking and excellent amenities. Ideal for young professionals and small families.

Cozy 1 BHK flat perfect for bachelors or young couples. Located in the heart of Bellandur with easy access to major IT companies. The complex offers modern amenities and is close to restaurants and entertainment options. Well-connected by public transport.

Contemporary 3 BHK flat in prestigious Embassy group project. Features premium specifications including wooden flooring in bedrooms, granite countertops, and branded fixtures. The complex boasts resort-style amenities with multiple swimming pools, indoor games, and wellness center. Near Eco Space and major IT hubs.

Value-for-money 2 BHK flat near Electronic City phase 1. Perfect for IT professionals working in the Electronic City corridor. The apartment offers good ventilation, ample storage space, and a well-designed layout. The complex has all essential amenities and good security.

Brand new 2 BHK flat with contemporary design and smart home features. Located on Kanakapura Road with easy access to Bangalore-Mysore highway. The project features eco-friendly construction, rainwater harvesting, and solar power. Great investment opportunity in a rapidly developing area with upcoming metro connectivity.

Spacious 3 BHK flat in well-established Prestige community. Features large living and dining areas, good cross-ventilation, and beautiful park views. Located in Phase 1 Electronic City with excellent connectivity to tech parks, schools, and hospitals. Well-maintained complex with active resident community.

properties.address: Total Environment Learning to Fly, Whitefield
properties.description: Unique eco-friendly 3 BHK flat with sustainable architecture and green living concepts. Features natural ventilation, recycled materials, and organic gardens. This artistic community is perfect for those who value environment-conscious living. Located in prime Whitefield with access to premium schools, hospitals, and shopping centers.
